text: Can you cancel a timed switch for my smart device?
Sure, I can help with that. Please provide me the ID of your smart device.
And what's the time for the current timed switch?
It's set for March 19th, 2023 at 9:30 AM.
Understood. Let me just call the CancelTimedSwitch API to cancel the timed switch.
Done! The timed switch has been cancelled successfully.
